review.title: “Healthy and fun organization to test your mettle and excel”
review.pros: Pros – - Management open to informed experimentation.- Culture is collaborative, peppy and fun.- Environment is conducive to go-getters, visionaries and innovators
review.cons: Cons – - being just 2-3 years old, EduRiser doesn't have deep rooted systems and processes (this is also a pro)
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – - Keep up the great work.- Hire and keep great people.- More focus on Strategy and Implementation than nitpicking on nitty-gritties
